name: Artemis (Zacksly)
description:
Controls Below, Please Read!

The Aetherial Knights are no more! Caesar has banished Aether use from the Empire and put a bounty on the heads of all those who use such mysterious powers! A boy named Artemis,  a son of one of the famed Aetherial Knights, finds himself captured at the  Knight's Castle. Will he be able to escape the wrath of Caesar? Only you can find out. Harness the power of the Aethers to find a way out of the Castle. If you are lucky, you'll be able to find the Knight's 15 secret coins as well!

The game is about an hour to an hour and a half long. Full auto-save is supported. If you close the game you will continue where you left off. 

(To read signs/thoughts crouch in front of them)

Keyboard & Mouse:
Movement: A, D
Jump/Double Jump: W / Space
Sprint: Shift
Shoot Bow: Left Mouse
Toggle Look Ahead: Q
Spin Attack/ Cancel Bow: Right Mouse
Crouch/Shield: S
Aether Ability: E / Middle Mouse (Yellow & Blue Aether)

Controller :
Movement: Left Stick
Jump/Double Jump: A
Sprint: X
Shoot Bow: Right Trigger
Toggle Look Ahead: Left Bumper
Spin Attack/Cancel Bow: B
Crouch/Shield: Left Trigger / Left Stick Down
Aether Ability: Right Bumper  (Yellow & Blue Aether)

Combo Moves:
High Jump: Crouch -> Jump
Slide: Movement -> Crouch
Slam: Jump -> Crouch
Spin Jump: Jump -> Spin Attack
